answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
Indeed they are. Key points are that registrants will soon receive an email with instructions, and the keynotes are viewable for 60 days.  
More specifics from the Virtual Conference FAQ: 
http://icma.org/m/en/icma/events/conference/virtual_conference/faq 
Already attending the conference in Charlotte?  
Great, we're excited to see you! You’ll benefit greatly from the onsite networking opportunities, as well as the field demos, social programs, and other educational sessions that have been planned. As a complement to your conference registration, archives of the virtual conference will be available to you after the conference. You will receive special registration instructions approximately one week after the conclusion of the conference. Continue the learning with your staff for  up to one year, right at your fingertips. Keynotes will be available for only 60 days.  After the conference ends, you will receive an email with special registration instructions to access the virtual conference archive.
